message: This is the first round. I'm offering you a product for $10000. I want to assure you that I'm not trying to deceive you. If you're willing to take a chance, I think you'll find that this product has some redeeming qualities, but I'm being upfront with you - it's not the best quality. I'm offering it to you at a price that's a significant discount from what I know a high-quality product would be worth. If you're interested, I'd be happy to discuss further.
I'm not interested in buying the product at this time. I'd like to wait and see what other products are available.

I'm glad you're being cautious in the first round! Now, I'd like to present to you a product that I'm confident you'll find exceptional. This product has received rave reviews and has a proven track record of excellence. I'd like to buy the product. I'm willing to take the chance that it's high-quality, and I'm hoping it will be worth the price.
